amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 601. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for W.A. Young & Sons Foundry, Greene County, Pennsylvania.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for W.A. Young & Sons Foundry Greene County Pennsylvania.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 328 (Roll no. 567).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 328 (Roll no. 567).
